title: Serial Spoiler Special: Extra Spoily Edition
description:
For one episode only, co-hosts David Haglund and Katy Waldman discuss Reddit threads, reporting, blogs, and other sources of information about Serial's murder investigation. Our guest, Slate's June Thomas, has avoided outside sources and joins us today to learn more. WARNING: Contains info not yet reported on Serial.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
